      • setCorsAllowedOrigins

        public ServerConfiguration.ServerConfigurationBuilder setCorsAllowedOrigins(Set<String> allowedOrigins)
        Sets the set of origins that are allowed to access the resources. All origins (*) are allowed by default.
        Parameters:
        allowedOrigins - the set of allowed origins
        Returns:
        the ServerConfigurationBuilder instance

      • setCorsAllowedMethods

        public ServerConfiguration.ServerConfigurationBuilder setCorsAllowedMethods(Set<String> allowedMethods)
        Sets the set of HTTP methods that are allowed to be used when accessing the resources. The default methods are: GET, POST and HEAD.
        Parameters:
        allowedMethods - the set of allowed HTTP methods
        Returns:
        the ServerConfigurationBuilder instance

      • setCorsAllowedHeaders

        public ServerConfiguration.ServerConfigurationBuilder setCorsAllowedHeaders(Set<String> allowedHeaders)
        Sets the set of HTTP headers that are allowed to be specified when accessing the resources. The default headers are X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Accept and Origin.
        Parameters:
        allowedHeaders - the set of allowed HTTP headers
        Returns:
        the ServerConfigurationBuilder instance

      • setCorsExposedHeaders

        public ServerConfiguration.ServerConfigurationBuilder setCorsExposedHeaders(Set<String> exposedHeaders)
        Sets the set of HTTP headers that are allowed to be exposed on the client. No headers are exposed by default.
        Parameters:
        exposedHeaders - the set of exposed HTTP headers
        Returns:
        the ServerConfigurationBuilder instance

      • withSsl

        public ServerConfiguration.ServerConfigurationBuilder withSsl(SslContextConfiguration sslContextConfig)
        Enables the use of SSL.
        Parameters:
        sslContextConfig - the SSL context configuration
        Returns:
        the ServerConfigurationBuilder instance

        public ServerConfiguration build()
        Builds the configured ServerConfiguration instance.
        Returns:
        the configured ServerConfiguration instance
